I'm not sure if this is the right component but it should go to PDE. Here's my
MANIFEST.MF:

Manifest-Version: 1.0
Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2
Bundle-Name: %PLUGIN_NAME
Bundle-SymbolicName: com.ibm.etools.environment.ui
Bundle-Version: 6.0.0
Bundle-Activator: com.ibm.etools.environment.ui.plugin.EnvironmentUIPlugin
Bundle-Vendor: IBM
Bundle-Localization: plugin
Export-Package: com.ibm.etools.environment.ui.adapter,
 com.ibm.etools.environment.ui.common,
 com.ibm.etools.environment.ui.dialog,
 com.ibm.etools.environment.ui.plugin,
 com.ibm.etools.environment.ui.task
Require-Bundle: com.ibm.etools.environment.core,
 org.eclipse.emf.common,
 org.eclipse.core.runtime,
 org.eclipse.core.resources,
 org.eclipse.swt,
 org.eclipse.jface,
 org.eclipse.ui,
 org.eclipse.ui.ide
Eclipse-AutoStart: true

PDE Build is changing some values (mainly the platform properties) of PDE UI
state, which then causes problems. 

This must be fix because it can then cause problems to pde ui when it gets back
the state.

PDE Build will now be carefull to not set any value, anymore.

Fixed in HEAD.
